description: It doesn't provide the actual functionality to edit the existing pdf document
essentially you can just write some text on top of the pdf, and choose text color. Not even text size, and cannot add images.
what developer has written this app? Has he ever learned about the resource management? This application explodes CPU as hell. In addition it has almost 0 functionality

The pdf file edited or saved by this app can be read only by itself, by okular and Atril Document viewer but when you email the pdf file it created to others they report that the pdf file is corrupted because it cannot be opened in Windows by Adobe acrobat reader or by foxit reader, cannot even read by Libre Office and xpdf.
summary: Great app, but the saved pdf file cannot be opened in Windows

description: Needed to fill in a PDF form and this did the job perfectly. Limited help but fairly easy to work out what to do. Simple but good at what it does, but doesn't let you edit and existing PDF.
summary: Very useful for filling in forms

description: Text does not scale according to system settings. On my hi-res display it is unreadable.
I needed to fill out some PDF forms and this did exactly what I needed.

This ap does what it says it does but I couldn't change either the font or size. Also I was unable to correct a typo in the text I added or delete the incorrect word(s) without reloading the file and starting over again .
If one can type without error it's extremely easy anmd quick to use.
Too immature. Interface is not suitable.
summary: Too immature. Interface is not suitable

description: I could hardly read the content of the PDF. So this application is rather useless for me.
summary: Text of PDF was barely readable

description: Excelente aplicación para editar renglones en paginas pdf.

La aplicación es muy sencilla y hace exactamente lo que tiene que hacer: Colocar textos de colores sobre el pdf. 
Luego de exportarse, el mismo pdf puede volver a ser editado con esta aplicación o con adobe reader.
Me encanto, muy funcional... gracias por este aporte... lo mejor de lo mejor, sensillo, funcional y facil de ocupar

Cette application est génial, simple d'utilisation, rapide, efficace.
Je vous recommende cella là.
Et on peut y ajouter du texte
interface un peu vieillo (on se croirait sur windows 95) mais pour ajouter du texte à des PDF c'est simple, rapide et efficace.
